row._Details: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-15" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE Content [ <!ATTLIST Content Ersteller CDATA "xxx" > ]> <Content Ersteller="">Info aus Objekt Template</Content>

row.process: :INC JOBI.INC.BASISPARAM ! ----------------------------- ! 1.) Parameter initialisieren: ! ----------------------------- :SET &PREV_NR# = &PREV_NR#PREV_STATE :SET &PREV_NAME# = &PREV_NAME# :SET &POS# = &POS# :SET &PREV_NIC# = &PREV_NIC# :SET &PREV_RC# = &PREV_RC# :SET &ADD_INFO# = &ADD_INFO# :SET &MESSAGE# = &MESSAGE# ! ----------------------- ! 2.) Parameter eruieren: ! ----------------------- :SET &PREV_NR# = SYS_ACT_PREV_NR() :SET &PREV_NAME# = SYS_ACT_PREV_NAME() :SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REV("&PREV_NAME#", ".") :SET &POS# = ADD(&POS#, 1) :SET &PREV_NIC# = SUBSTR("&PREV_NAME#", &POS#) :SET &PREV_RC# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(, &PREV_NR#, "RETCODE") :SET &PREV_STATE# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(, &PREV_NR#, "STATUS") ! ---------------------------------- :PRINT ">>> INFO:" :PRINT " -> PREV_NAME = &PREV_NAME#" :PRINT " -> PREV_NIC = &PREV_NIC#" :PRINT " -> PREV_NR = &PREV_NR#" :PRINT " -> PREV_RC = &PREV_RC#" :PRINT " -> PREV_STATE= &PREV_STATE#" ! -------------------------------------------------------- ! 3.) Zusatzinfo zur Meldung durchreichen, wenn vorhanden: ! (Hierdurch soll eine naehere Erleuterung im Falle ! von Mehrfachverwendung von Objekten erreicht werden) ! -------------------------------------------------------- :IF &ADD_INFO# <> "" : SET &MESSAGE# = "&ADD_INFO# -> " :ENDIF ! -------------------------- ! 4.) Versand der Info-Mail: ! -------------------------- :SET &MESSAGE# = "&MESSAGE#&PREV_NIC# mit RC=&PREV_RC# beendet" ! --------------------------------------- ! 5. Klartext zu Obkjektstatus ermitteln: ! --------------------------------------- :SET &STATUS# = GET_VAR(VARA.ALL.BATCH_STATUS, &PREV_STATE#, 1) :SET &DESCRIPTION# = "STATUS: &STATUS#" :SET &BATCHNAME# = "&PAPPL#" :SET &SEVERITY# = "1" ! ------------------------------------------------------- ! Im Falle von ANY_SKIPPED ANY_INACTIVE kein Mailversand: ! ------------------------------------------------------- ! RC 1919 - 1934 ANY_SKIPPED/ANY_INACTIVE ! RC 1940 - 1944 ANY_TIMEOUT ! ------------------------------------------------------- :SWITCH "Y" : CASE &PREV_STATE# between 1930 and 1934 : CASE &PREV_STATE# between 1940 and 1944 : PRINT ">>> Aufgrund des Returnwertes &STATUS# erfolgt kein Mailversand ..." : OTHER : INC JOBI.SENDMAIL :ENDSWITCH
